Magna Aliquam

About Me

I was born in a small town. Now I live in a big city. In between I got a Computer Science degree from Rensselaer. Now I work for a consulting firm outside of Washington, D.C.. I write primarily in Ruby, and do cloud migrations for federal agencies. To that end I am an AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional

I've also obtained my Basic Chef Fluency Badge
